import React from "react"; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import * as actions from '../../store/actions/index' import classes from './sellerAccordian.module.css' const SelleAccordian = props => { return (

{props.name}

) } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { id: state.category.id } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { return { updateId: (id) => dispatch(actions.updateId(id)) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(SelleAccordian);
